question: Where was [X] born?
label: place of birth
description: most specific known (e.g. city instead of country, or hospital instead of city) birth location of a person, animal or fictional character

question: Where did [X] die?
label: place of death
description: most specific known (e.g. city instead of country, or hospital instead of city) death location of a person, animal or fictional character

question: What is [X] a subclass of?
label: subclass of
description: all instances of these items are instances of those items; this item is a class (subset) of that item. Not to be confused with P31 (instance of)

question: What is the official language of [X]?
label: official language
description: language designated as official by this item

question: What position does [X] play in?
label: position played on team / speciality
description: position or specialism of a player on a team, e.g. Small Forward

question: Where was [X] originally aired on?
label: original network
description: network(s) the radio or television show was originally aired on,  including

question: Where does [X] share border with?
label: shares border with
description: countries or administrative subdivisions, of equal level, that this item borders, either by land or water

question: What is [X] named after?
label: named after
description: entity or event that inspired the subject's name, or namesake (in at least one language)

question: What is the original language of [X]?
label: original language of film or TV show
description: language in which a film or a performance work was originally created. Deprecated for written works; use P407 ("language of work or name") instead.

question: What is [X] a member of?
label: member of
description: organization or club to which the subject belongs. Do not use for membership in ethnic or social groups, nor for holding a position such as a member of parliament (use P39 for that).

question: Which field does [X] work in?
label: field of work
description: specialization of a person or organization; see P106 for the occupation

question: What is the profession of [X]?
label: occupation
description: occupation of a person; see also "field of work" (Property:P101), "position held" (Property:P39)

question: What is [X] consisted of?
label: has part
description: part of this subject; inverse property of "part of" (P361). See also "has parts of the class" (P2670).

question: Which country does [X] maintain diplomatic relations with?
label: diplomatic relation
description: diplomatic relations of the country

question: What is [X] produced by?
label: manufacturer
description: manufacturer or producer of this product

question: What is the country of citizenship of [X]?
label: country of citizenship
description: the object is a country that recognizes the subject as its citizen

question: What language was [X] written in?
label: language of work or name
description: language associated with this creative work (such as books, shows, songs, or websites) or a name (for persons use P103 and P1412)

question: Which continent is [X] a part of?
label: continent
description: continent of which the subject is a part

question: Which organisation developed [X]?
label: developer
description: organisation or person that developed the item

question: What is [X] the capital of?
label: capital of
description: country, state, department, canton or other administrative division of which the municipality is the governmental seat

question: Where is [X] is located?
label: located in the administrative territorial entity
description: the item is located on the territory of the following administrative entity. Use P276 (location) for specifying the location of non-administrative places and for items about events

question: What language did [X] use to communicate?
label: languages spoken, written or signed
description: language(s) that a person speaks or writes, including the native language(s)

question: What organisation does or did [X] work for?
label: employer
description: person or organization for which the subject works or worked

question: What music does [X] play?
label: genre
description: creative work's genre or an artist's field of work (P101). Use main subject (P921) to relate creative works to their topic

question: Which country is [X] located in?
label: country
description: sovereign state of this item; don't use on humans

question: What position does or did [X] hold?
label: position held
description: subject currently or formerly holds the object position or public office

question: What music label is [X] represented by?
label: record label
description: brand and trademark associated with the marketing of subject music recordings and music videos

question: Where is [X] located?
label: location
description: location of the item, physical object or event is within. In case of an administrative entity use P131. In case of a distinct terrain feature use P706.

question: Which city did [X] work in?
label: work location
description: location where persons were active

question: Which religion is [X] affiliated with?
label: religion
description: religion of a person, organization or religious building, or associated with this subject

question: What instrument does [X] play?
label: instrument
description: musical instrument that a person plays

question: What is [X] owned by?
label: owned by
description: owner of the subject

question: What is the native language of [X]?
label: native language
description: language or languages a person has learned from early childhood

question: What is the twin city of [X]?
label: twinned administrative body
description: twin towns, sister cities, twinned municipalities and other localities that have a partnership or cooperative agreement, either legally or informally acknowledged by their governments

question: In which territorial jurisdiction is [X] a legal term?
label: applies to jurisdiction
description: the item (an institution, law, public office ...) or statement belongs to or has power over or applies to the value (a territorial jurisdiction: a country, state, municipality, ...)

question: What is [X] an instance of?
label: instance of
description: that class of which this subject is a particular example and member (subject typically an individual member with a proper name label); different from P279; using this property as a qualifier is deprecated—use P2868 or P3831 instead

question: Which country was [X] created in?
label: country of origin
description: country of origin of this item (creative work, food, phrase, product, etc.)

question: Where is the headquarter of [X]?
label: headquarters location
description: specific location where an organization's headquarters is or has been situated. Inverse property of "occupant" (P466).

question: Where is the capital of [X]?
label: capital
description: primary city of a country, state or other type of administrative territorial entity

question: Where was [X] founded?
label: location of formation
description: location where a group or organization was formed

question: What is [X] part of?
label: part of
description: object of which the subject is a part (it's not useful to link objects which are themselves parts of other objects already listed as parts of the subject). Inverse property of "has part" (P527, see also "has parts of the class" (P2670)).
